pageProduct.name: Avene Antirougeurs Fort 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Concentrated redness-relief care for sensitive skin prone to chronic redness.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic. For external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes.

Common Uses

Targeted concentrated care for localized redness and visible blood vessels which reduces redness, soothes irritation and heat sensations, and leaves the skin comfortable and velvety.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. PROPYLENE GLYCOL DICAPRYLATE/DICAPRATE. PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRACAPRYLATE/TETRACAPRATE. GLYCERIN. GLYCERYL STEARATE. BUTYLENE GLYCOL. CETEARYL ALCOHOL. STEARIC ACID. BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER) (BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER). DIMETHICONE. AMMONIUM ACRYLOYL DIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER. BENZOIC ACID. CETEARETH-33. DEXTRAN SULFATE. DIMETHICONOL. DISODIUM EDTA. HESPERIDIN METHYL CHALCONE. PHENOXYETHANOL. RUSCUS ACULEATUS ROOT EXTRACT. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. TOCOPHERYL ACETATE.

Directions

Apply morning and/or evening onto targeted areas after cleansing with Antirougeurs redness-relief refreshing cleansing lotion applying Antirougeurs Redness-reflief moisturizing protecting emulsion or cream all over the face.
